Headline: #72 North Temporary Westbound Reroute near North Avenue/Sedgwick
ShortDescription: Westbound 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Sedgwick, Black Hawk, Larabee, then resume normal route, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Sedgwick, Black Hawk, Larabee, then resume normal route on North Avenue, due to street blockage near North Avenue/Sedgwick.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Stewart
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Halsted, 115th and over regular route due to, street blockage near 115th/Stewart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Halsted, 115th and over regular route, due to a street blockage near 115th/Stewart.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays at Wellington due to a stalled train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays at Wellington due to a stalled train. 

As a result of the delay Loop-bound Brown Line trains will operate from Kimball to Fullerton and reroute Kimball-bound at Fullerton.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
